item.title: Pi-Hole Setup on Raspberry Pi 3
item.description: In this post, I will cover how to install a Raspbian system from scratch, along with the setup of pi-hole, to block internet trackers on the network level. Pi-Hole serves both as a DNS forwarder and cache, and should be configured as the DNS server for your network. This guarantees that all users of your network will be automatically shielded from internet tracking. You also might notice a reduction in bandwidth usage, since assets from ad networks and trackers are not loaded because of the ‘blackholing’.
